TEXT.TITLE: NASDAQ TO OPEN OFFICE IN LONDON
TEXT.BODY: National Association of Securities Dealers Inc said it will be opening a London-based European office in mid-1987. A spokesman said the office would probably open by July. NASDAQ said its board of governors appointed J. Lynton Jones to be its European executive director. Reuter
